DOC.brief_title: Culturally Sensitive Intervention Improve Retention HIV Care Latino MSM
DOC.detailed_description: While early receipt adherence antiretroviral therapy critical effective HIV treatment , engagement retention HIV care essential first step . Retention HIV care particularly important traditionally disadvantage group , Latino MSMs , over-represented HIV epidemic . HIV+ Latino MSM therefore urgently need intervention improve retention HIV care , may affect number culture-specific factor . The goal proposal culturally adapt tailor exist , theory-based intervention , use state-of-the-art method design maximize cultural sensitivity , feasibility acceptability HIV+ Latino MSM , test small randomize control trial ( n=60 intervention ; n=60 control ) . The study conduct among insufficiently retain HIV+ Latino MSM AltaMed , large provider HIV medical service Latinos Los Angeles . The propose intervention design retain participant HIV care address barrier facilitator HIV care salient Latinos , use group-based well one-on-one , peer-based learning approach .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria include : 1 ) HIV+ ; 2 ) > 18 year old ; 3 ) male ; 4 ) fluent Spanish ; 5 ) selfidentify Latino Hispanic ethnicity ; 6 ) Selfidentify gay ever sex men ; 7 ) Must schedule visit AltaMed prior 12 month ) few one visit prior four month b ) detectable viral load Exclusion Criteria include 1 ) schedule visit AltaMed prior 12 month ) one visit prior four month b ) undetectable viral load ; 2 ) unable give inform consent ; 3 ) Lack Spanish language skill
